mapper.insert: insert into user values( #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{mail}, #{phone}, #{nick}, now(), ifnull( #{profile}, profile ), ifnull( #{greet}, greet ) )
insert into s_board values(0, #{ subject }, #{ content }, #{ writer }, now(), 0, #{ location }, #{ picture }, 0 )
mapper.select: select no, subject, writer, date_format(wdate, '%Y-%m-%d') wdate, hit, datediff(now(), wdate) wgap, ifnull(picture, '') picture, reply from s_board where location like #{ location } order by no desc
